summary: Three outlaws come to the aid of a young girl after her father is killed.
cast: George O'Brien|Olive Borden|Lou Tellegen|Tom Santschi|J. Farrell MacDonald|Frank Campeau|Priscilla Bonner|Otis Harlan|Phyllis Haver|George Harris|Alec B. Francis|Jay Hunt|Grace Gordon|George Irving|Bud Osborne|Vester Pegg|Walter Perry
keywords: damsel in distress|dakota territory|reference to ulysses s. grant|outlaw|gold
title: Tres hombres malos
